attributes.action: Why is gluten free food so much more expensive
attributes.additional_details: Because we’re having to pay for gluten free food witch is smaller and so more expensive
attributes.background: Lower the price on gluten free food

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the price of gluten food are a matter for manufacturers and retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Voucher scheme for those with Coeliacs Disease for gluten-free food: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620602
